name: Adventurers of Regicide
description:
Adventurers of Regicide is a retro-inspired RPG where the player takes control of Princess Euphoria and her friends and family, who were once royalty of a magnificent kingdom. The player will go through several areas before fighting President Charter, a shadowy leader behind the coup and the leader of a religion known as Levism. The religion celebrates love and prosperity, but is there a darkness behind the light? All will be revealed with Adventurers of Regicide!

If you like the RPGs of the 8-bit and 16-bit era, than you will love Adventurers of Regicide!

Support us by becoming a patron today!

Features

  • A real time battle system that's easy to win and hard to master
  • A variety of worlds, from a quaint hamlet to busting cities, from a snowy mountain to a futuristic techno tower!
  • A wide variety of weapons, clothing, shields and items
  • Bribe and talk to your enemies to get out of battling!
  • Random events that happen to keep you on your toes
  • No random encounters
  • Grindless gameplay
  • Customize each character to your liking with Amulets, Focuses and Tactics.
